com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKMapViewStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKMapViewStyle

  • public class SKMapViewStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Model object for a map style, defined by resources folder and json file.
    Version:
    2.5

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SKMapViewStyle.SKDisplayDensity
      Contains possible values for map display density.
      static class  SKMapViewStyle.SKMapStyleDetail
      Contains possible values for map style detail (depending on the phone).
